content.detailedDescription:
At midnight on july 31st/august 1st, i was leaving my house on the way to band practice. after walking through my back yard to my car, i witnessed a light suddenly appear in the south-east sky straight ahead of me. i was excited to be seeing this, and took out my phone so i could attempt to capture photos or videos, but unfortunately this object ended up being too dim to capture with my phone's camera. the object hovered in-place for an instant, before beginning a slow, wavering flight path toward the north-west. the object then slowed to a near stop, moved at nearly a 90-degree angle toward the east for a short distance, then changed direction again and continued toward the north-west. about 2-3 seconds later, it quickly faded in brightness until it was no longer visible, so i thought that was it for this sighting. but then about 1-2 seconds after this, it suddenly reappeared a short distance ahead of it's last visible location, and continued moving overhead and on toward the north-west. once again, after 2-3 seconds the object quickly faded to invisibility. about a second after i lost sight of it, i saw a beam of light flash in the sky; this light-beam seemed to originate from a short way ahead of where the ufo had been when it vanished from view, and expanded outward toward the west. a second after the light flash occurred, the ufo reappeared at about 50-55 degrees above the horizon to the north-west, and continued moving off toward the north-west horizon. i lost sight of it when it past beyond my house.

i waited a few minutes, but didn't see anything else, so i left for band practice. when i returned home from band practice, i had a multiple-ufo sighting, and managed to capture the brightest object i witnessed on video. i will be submitting a separate report on this sighting asap, and will try to upload the video with it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Witnessed bright light suddenly appear in the sky, then begin moving. disappeared/reappeared several times & seemed to project light beam.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving hard rock casino in tampa and on top of the parking garage. the moon was full and beautiful. i stopped to take a picture. as i was focussing on the second pic i saw a round ball rise from the ground and go up to the moon. i moved the camera to see if it was really there. it was. it moved around the moon in a random irregular way. i took several pics before it disappeared. at first i wondered if it was a spotlight but it seemed to be a different face in each picture and it happened again wjile i was at home on the next full moon. this time i took more pics , and it happened again at a friend's house. i saw the moon first then the red ball would fly to it and around it each time. each picture was a different face always looking at me. i had friends and wittnesses at each instance.
   after studying the images and showing them to people i wonder if it was alive, or a planet?...   (possibly satan, or nibiru?)
content.summary: I noticed the moon was full and beautiful so i took a picture of it. as i was focussing for the second pic i saw a red ball .

content.detailedDescription: I was camping alone on the night of july 31- aug 1.  i awoke in the night, i am guessing around 3 am.  my tent was filled by a bright light that started off whitish but changed to bright blue.  it was shining through the tent, from the outside.  i do not remember hearing anything, but i remember feeling strange and disoriented.  i did not have the urge to leave my tent, just to close my eyes and hope it went away.  i woke up again, i am not sure how much later.  i felt less disoriented and was wondering why i had woken earlier.  i then remembered the blue light and i then had a memory of a small hooded figure at the edge of my campsite.  when i noticed it, it flashed closer to me without walking.  i have no memory of a craft or anything else, but i have had sightings in the past.  this has been disturbing me for the past few days and i needed to share my story.
content.summary: Blue light filled tent, memory of a small hooded figure nearby

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

i (together with 50-100 people) had witnessed a major ufo sighting in lausanne, switzerland in 1997, and it still mystifies me to this date.  what is most surprising is that i am unable to find any reference to it on the internet and so am writing to you in the hope that you would be able to investigate.

the year was 1997 and i was doing my post-graduate studies in an internationally acclaimed institution in lausanne that year.  i am from asia ans have since gone back to live in asia, it was only that year that i was spending in lausanne.  it was in the later half of the year probably in  aug or sep. it was a saturday night, and had gone out in one part of lausanne with some friends.  i then left that part of lausanne and was walking to another part of lausanne where i was meeting some other friends.

suddenly, i saw hundreds of people who had stepped out of their restaurants and looking in the sky.  this was near the lake geneva shore and the area was an upmarket one with classy restaurants. the people witnessing this were all urban, well educated and well-off people.  i looked up in the sky and saw somewhere between 15 - 20 lights hovering in the sky. they were fairly low in the sky and hence could be seen clearly, ie no room for doubt on maybe eyes playing game on us etc. the closest one could think of the lights was a formation of military aircrafts, but they couldn't be aircrafts because they were just stationary and making no sound.  as i mentioned, it was so unique that people eating in many restaurants there had all come out of their restaurants half way through their meal to witness this.  after a few mins, the lights moved up into the sky very quickly and disappeared in the same formation, perfectly synchronised. i myself am a well educated person in senior management, and not one prone to believing in unexplained phenomena.  this was a very clear incident of unidentified flying object with no room for doubt.

unfortunately, none of my friends were there. i expected this to be reported in the newspapers next day.  but the newspapers were all in french and i don't know french at all. i asked some of my friends who knew french whether anything was mentioned in the newspapers, and they said no.  those days of course, the internet was just in its infancy.

for years now, every now and then, i search the internet to see if this has been highlghted anywhere, especially in specialist ufo sites like yours, but surprise not to find anything.  i am hoping you have associates in lausanne, switzerland who are able to talk to the locals there and find out. this took place in an area called ouchy, that is just by the lakeside. there are a clutch of restaurants on avenue willaim fraise very close to the movenpick hotel. 

thanks
content.summary: 15 to 20 lights hovering in the night sky over lausanne, startling enough that people left their meals mid-way in the restaurants to come and see this

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Four friends and me had been to the beach that day and later that evening we had a bbq in the garden and in the clear, bright and warm night we sat outside enjoying a beer and suddenly one of them said that he saw a ufo we all said yea yea its good with you and laughed about it. my friend who first noticed it continued untill we all noticed it cause it flew around on the sky. we tryed to explain it and made conclusions about it was a satalite or other known objects until it became clear that it was nothing any of us had ever seen before. we just sat there in awe over the way it acted and flew around. it was not something i know or have ever seen before or after for that matter. it was not a satalite cause it would move extremely fast in what seemed random directions. like from east to west on the nightsky in a split of a second. it would then maybe go north appear, blink away (disapear) then you could see it appear in the west. it would litterly just play around on the night sky like you sometimes see pilots do. but this was not a normal plane. it became very clar after it kept appearing/disapearing and flying around on the sky from one end of the night sky to the other end with a speed that seemed so fast that it just went with a blink of the eyes. it fly very slowly emitting a light then suddenly it would blink and be gone to only appear very far away from the place it disapeared from. it would also zig zag around making turns that no planes i have heard of or seen before make. it flew around almost like it was communicating or playing around in the night sky kinda like it was desperate for attention or saying hey look at me up here! we kept seeing the object play around on the sky for over an hour more like two hours. it was a clear bright night so it was easily to see that it was not a plane, satalite, lantern, drone or any other object i have ever seen on the sky or heard of. i was stunned and amased i couldnt get my eyes of the object i didnt even think about filming it not that my cell phone camera would have done much good. but i just sat there and was stunned and somewhat chocked but also intriqued i have never belived in things like this before and here it was before my eyes and with four other people that saw the exact same. it gave me a feeling i havent had i guess. it was not like i felt scared or anything like that. i know what i saw and it was real. it was an intelligent controlled craft of some sort that i havent seen before and my mom was in the airforce and i was very interested in planes when i was younger and this one i saw didnt fly like any other plane i have seen before. it defied normal g force and gravity. it didnt even make a sound at all. it emitted some kind of light once in awaile and just before it dispeared or speeded up it would emit a little more bright light before it disapeared to appear another place but no sound at all really that i remember. we didnt really loose sight of the object we kinda just stopped watching it after something over an hour. it sort of just triggered all sorts of speculations about humans, earth, space and such things and we just began talking instead and debating so we kinda stopped sitting and watching it but it could have flewn around there more i guess we just stopped watching it. now i havent given it much thought until another friend of mine i told this to said me to report it here so thats what i am doing.
content.summary: No sound flickering lighting ufo zig zagging around on the nightsky, from one end to the other with a blink of an eye, it kinda blinked just before dispeared and when it appeared in another place.

content.detailedDescription: I was following up on the recent sighting i had from one of nasa's solar observation satellites', seeing if the first reported sighting i had was still visible. i noticed nasa altered the first orb, making it resemble a slow moving object like an asteroid. i witnessed the second object moving at very high speed from east to west above the first object i reported to you nearly a week ago. i immediately recognized the second object resembling the first, before nasa had originally altered it. the object was nearly identical to the first one before its alteration. it moved from east to west at incredibly high speeds moving directly over the changed image of the first. upon viewing it, i saw that this new one had a large wing like structure, just like the first. the new object pulsated across its entire surface at high even intervals, just like the first one had. whatever it was, its size was slightly larger than the first object. i was shocked to have witnessed the first one, and lucky enough to have recorded it, before and after its alteration. but to see a second one and larger than the first, and moving across and above the first? i couldn't believe it! but it was there! i spoke to a co-worker of mine who is a retired special forces soldier, and he told me he didn't want to get in trouble for saying what it could be, but he did say that the first object appeared to be of truly immense size! whatever the case, i did get the new one on video as well. i honestly think you need to see the video clips i recorded of these things. whatever they are, they appear to be controlled. if possible, contact me please. i honestly think the video recordings should be viewed. i lost sight of the object when the monitor counting the date and time reset itself to 3 days prior. once again i am faced with the issue of my phone not being able to download the video footage, but as i said i am more than willing to show it to someone in person if this is possible.
content.summary: Viewed from solar observing satelite. saw one pulsating orb mooving from the suns gravity field, followed by a second pulsating orb mooving above the first from east to west at stable high speed

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my patio and saw bright light in the sky, took my phone and recorded till it went over by building and out of sight.
content.summary: Slow moving, bright with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
first week of june 2014 at 4.30pm i took my dog for her regular  walk to grant street, williamsburg, brooklyn, ny. it was a sunny day with clear blue skies, as i sat on a bench by the hudson river enjoying  the view of manhattan skyline. 

suddenly a very large glowing gold boxy oblong  object  appeared in the sky, flying slowly  in a controlled straight line, low just above the rooftops of manhattan sky line, heading in the  direction of williamsburg bridge. two  helicopters were observed at a distance  in front and behind.

 i jumped up from my seat in utter amazement at the size and shape, trying to work out what else it could be other than a ufo.  observed object for five minutes or more, slowly flying towards  williamsburg bridge, in direction of  brooklyn bridge. lost sight of it when the buildings blocked my view.

 due to many unusual ufo  and paranormal experiences from childhood in england, i have been interested in all related subjects,  observing the skies for ufo activity for 63 years. traveled extensively  working as a professional artist and designer in television. 

 experienced many ufo sightings in london, australia and a few in new york since 2010. 

latest rendering of recent sighting in july 2014, boxy ufo object the size of a house looks identical, other than in day time there was no black windows or outside lights. it glowed all over whitish gold.
content.summary: Ufo size of house square/oblong glowing white gold illuminated over manhattan skyline, flying low in straight line

content.detailedDescription: Well this is hard for me because it has been awhile since this event happened to me it was early in the morning my parents and everyone in the house were laying down for the night and so was i i dont know why i woke up but i did i went out to the kitchen to get some water and took a look outside it was a beautiful night out so i put my shoes on and i went outside i was standing on the deck when this thing i cant explain what it looked like came shooting out of the sky and stopped right over the small lake it must have been 500 feet across all around with bright rainbow colored light on the sides but all around the craft it was probably 50 feet away from shore i looked and looked and then woke up in my bed the next morning i belive i saw something and i cannot forget this vision this memory i have and that make me feel like something more happened i think about that night everday and i wont forget it
content.summary: Oak lake flat disc with lights on sides going all around 2008

content.detailedDescription: It was a dull green looked like a clunker,sorta burnt.I was letting my dog out to go pee.He looked up and seen it then he just went pee.I seen a blinking light on the bottom of it caught my attention.A lighting flash which illuminated the craft then a light circled the dish part but i could only see a crescant.I came in and thought did i really see that?Did the dog see that?My mom said don't tell anyone.It was dull green and floating like a balloon but it was massive.It looked old like a car you would trade in,a clunker kinda burnt.Maybe i'm crazy,maybe the dog is too?I can describe it plain as day,the bottom had a rectangular thing twice its total size.The top was domed with maybe ten,twelve windows with mullions between.I could not see anyone in it it was just visible during a flash of lightining.
content.summary: It was coasting like a balloon

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside talking to my little brother we observed a sequentially flashing light heading south from the nw sector. it then doubled back nw with another flashing object the longer we were outside the more ufos we saw. there was one that had a dim light but the light got brighter and was casting light down on us. there was a triangular formation to the ne that started out somewhat close but then expanded and dimmed out. this is not the first time we have seen ufos in our area there is a very high ufo count in our area. tonight there were various ufos in various motions and actions. i was talking on a landline wireless phone when the phone cut out. i was in range of the receiver so there was no reason that the phone should have disconnected. 

when i saw the object i immediately identified it as a ufo. we lost sight of the object when it flew past the horizon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Was outside talking to family and saw a sequentially flashing lights heading south

content.detailedDescription: Hey guys, love the shows yall have, ok, at around 9:00 pm had my telescope out looking at moon, saturn, and such when i noticed a light at the upper portion of the moon that is lit at this time. it got brighter and stayed that illumination throughout and still there. then i noticed 2 more lights at the lower right quadrant where the moon is dark. the lights appear to be oblong or coming out of a shaft or tube, they are long in structure but pointing in different directions. i have seen a lot of things in the sky at nite that i cant explain but this is on the moon and to me that is very weird and unsettleing. i just wish i had a more powerful telescope so i could see more closer look at it. it is now 9:55 and they are still there. the one in the lit portion of the moon appears to have moved positions a small degree of location. if you need more you have all my info and i will keep watching. please take a look and see if you can see and maybe you will know what they are.  thanks guys.
content.summary: Look at the moon, 1 bright in upper portion and 2 at bottom where shaded area begins. looked at moon alot and these are new, never seen befor.

content.detailedDescription: We walked outside right around 9 p.M. and noticed a teardrop-shaped flame in the sky. it seemed to be hovering and pulsating, just like a flame from a fire. it stayed in the same spot, then seemed to get a little smaller and with that, it was gone!!
content.summary: Flaming glow hovering in the sky, pulsating. then it seemed to get smaller and disappear completely

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car with my family in savannah, ga driving on i-16w. we were just passing chatham parkway/dean forest road area. my husband was driving and he asked me if i saw the object in the sky. i looked for myself and saw a light in the sky. it was bright like a flouresent light. it was in the shape of an  triangle. my husband and i were trying to figure out what  the object was.  it was not moving at all. it was not blinking. so, we did not think it was a plane. i continued to stare at it until it vanished. i continued to look in the sky and did not see it again. we were curious and wanted to know what it was and also we wanted to make sure that both of us saw it.  we thought it was a cool experience but would really like to know what it was. we lost sight once it disappeared without a path.
content.summary: My husband and i were driving i-16w at 9pm on a wednesday night. my husband saw the object first and then asked me if i saw it. i looked out of the front windshield and leaned forward and tilted my head left, and looking up to the left.

content.detailedDescription: Driving in my can on whitewood, giant beam of golden light looked like comet at first till i got closer, a comet the world was ending falling then came closer, beaming n radation in picture, boomerang shape, changed direction and hovered golden light so bright, i was scared for the world then i was afraid when got close i new it was something out of this world and as i saw the picture i speeded up and was very scared, after afraid of getting they would find me and had a nightmare about it. it went out of my view and changed direction i was driving the other way cause it changed direction once again cars were coming i had to watch the rode.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike, radation in pic,changed direction, beamed golden light boomerang shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking a friend out to there car around 12:30-1am and after saying goodbye to them i waved then went and sat in my car to lock up and what not. next thing i remember is waking up a couple blocks away at a gas station sitting at the pump, first thing i noticed was a couple people talking to the left of me and to the right of me in my vehicles passenger seat was all the possessions that were in my pocket, including cell phone cigarettes lighter etc. when i picked up the phone i noticed i had a bunch of missed calls from my girlfriend and son of whom were at my house when i walked the friend out, thats also when i noticed that it 4:30am and i had no idea how i got there. when i got back home i walked in to of course a extremely mad girlfriend whom i had to tell that i dont remember what happened. of course that to her was the lamest excuse shed ever heard. but one thing is she and my son now that that was something i just would never do in a million years, to this day the memory ive gotten of the incident is hearing a high pitched ringing in my ears before blacking out.
content.summary: Loss of 4 and a half hours awakened somewhere else

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) is a frequent observer of the night sky.  on two evenings he observed a bright star-like object to the nnw at about 32 degrees inclination moving from side to side and up and down around the same general position in the sky.   the light exhibited various colors of white, yellow, red, green and the sightings lasted about 20 minutes.
content.summary: Bright star-like object displaying various colors, small movements in same general sky location.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a photo  of the moon out of my bedroom window, open at the time. using my digital slr sony a58 camera, and using a 55-300 lens at full length, i was taking photos of the moon, as it was clear night, no clouds or breeze etc. the camera was on a tripod and i was using a remote, to reduce shake.

i only saw the object after i uploaded the photos onto my computer...The object didn't appear in any photos prior or after the image with the object.

i am ruling out a bird or a bat or a plane/helicopter as, when i zoom in, it just seems as though the object is too far away, and actually looks like its closer to the moon than the earth!
content.summary: Taking a photo of the full moon. object appeared in a photo

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2145 i went to the veranda and looked out south over the city. in the distance, above and to the right of some unused industrial chimneys, there was a bright red-yellow light moving slowly upwards. at first i thought it was a firework and i waited for it to explode. however, it continued to moved vertically upwards and did not explode. it then slowly begun to move horizontally eastward.
the bright light was not flashing and was not point-like, but dense in the middle. it moved slowly for about 2 minutes, covering around 4 km, and then slowed until it was almost hovering. then gradually the light dimmed to a red-brown and went out.
the sky was mostly clear, but there were a few wispy clouds; and i tried to see whether the light/object was still there, but it seemed to have disappeared. there was practically no wind. i then turned 180 degrees to go back inside my flat, when i noticed a second very bright light/object in the sky to the west. this had the exact same appearance as the first bright light. the light was very bright and was hovering. it then slowly moved horizontally towards the south, but then the light begun to fade, as had the previous bright light, and it disappeared.
i went in and thought about it, and then five minutes later came out again, and there was a third bright light as the other two, in a similar location to the second. it behaved similarly to the second light and faded out again.
there is an airport to the east, but the first light/object did not move exactly towards that and it faded out well before the airport location. the other two bright lights had no direction that could be obviously associated with the airport. 
according to the flight timetable there were no planes expected at that time. about one hour after the bright lights, there was an airplane coming in to iasi airport; but this was very distinctly an airplane with a flashing tail light and a very different appearance to the bright lights which appeared earlier.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three separate bright slowly moving lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
2. what made you first notice the object?
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?



1-in my home and gardening
2-i notice it while lookin stars
3-immediately i think all possibilities and drop out 
4-triangule shape and 3 basketball size light orb w/ no sound and going straight direction all glowing white and very fast i think 
5-i saw it and think all possibilities and report
6- just go
content.summary: When gardening i see triangule shape and 3 basketball size light orb w/ no sound and going straight direction all glowing white and very fast i think

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside in our backyard , when i looked in the distance at the sky and saw a shining ball of orange light. at first it looked like a street light but then i realized it was hovering just above above the level of the street lights and was not attached to anything. i studied it for a few seconds on my own then called my boyfriend over to take a look at it. he was taken back as well. after we both were looking at it for maybe 5 seconds it slowly started descending getting smaller as it went down then eventually going out completely. we both said to each other how crazy what we just saw was, and that of course if we ever tried to explain it to people we know they would think we're on something. but what we saw was unexplainable. not a street light, not a plane.
content.summary: Shining ball of orange light in sky decended getting dimmer until completely out

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my wife and kids from the gas station to home in downtown bremen indiana. we were walking west along plymouth street. i looked up and noticed a round and fairly good size orange sphere in the sky moving from north to southwest. it seemed to be lower than plane altitude. there was absolutely no noise eminating from this object. we are use to hearing planes and helicopters in this area as we are in a major flight path for several major airports. i would predict t the object was about the altitude of a helicopter path in full flight. the object moved slower than a plane and smooth and silently. it had an orange glow mixed with a little red. the whole object had a flicker like pulsing to it. i watched the object for approximately 10 minutes. the area we were in is well lit and stars are not easily visible yet this object was very bright and noticeable.
content.summary: I observed a bright glowing sphere like a structered fireball moving from north to southwest

content.detailedDescription: I was moving from frame to frame on google earth when i found these photos. i dont know if they are ufo's or what they are.
content.summary: I got this off of google earth street level (long lat in pics

content.detailedDescription: I was at a campfire with 3 boys on lovewell pond in fryeburg, me. we were toasting marshmellows, when one of the boys said, "what is that in the sky flying all weird?" i didn't know what to make of it.   it was flying in an extreme wavy pattern, changing in color and brightness until it sped away at an impressive speed or faded away.
content.summary: Spherical light that changed in color and intensity. flew in a wavy pattern before flying off.

content.detailedDescription: a bright,star-like object that had been visible to me the past 3 years during the summer months decided to relocate. i was outside taking photos of unusual objects for several years and this blue-white object resembling a star was visible during that period of time. it moved just like a common star does in the night sky. since the sky was clear that evening after being overcast for a few days, i decided to glance up before going to bed. i located the stationary object and, within 30 seconds, it started to move. i ran inside to get my green laser and quickly acquired the object as it was moving north at a slow, steady pace. it dimmed down to a bright pinpoint prior to once again regaining its original intensity. this sequence was observed 6 times before the object was out of sight. when it was stationary for 3 years i had noticed a reddish glow near the top and a blue-green color at the 5 o'clock position intermittently. about 1/2 way through its journey it drew parallel to a small, dim star-like object ( about 2 inches to the right ). as if on cue, this small, stationary unknown began moving, quickly accelerating to the speed of the primary object. the smaller unknown never brightened. both continued north until they were out of sight. it became obvious that there was a form of intelligence behind this harmonious performance. a large amount of energy would be required to light up the motionless primary "craft" to mimic the star-like image. additionally, i think this unidentified object was rather large, necessitating a powerful propulsion system. i plan to search my database of images to acquire photos taken of the primary unknown.
content.summary: On 6/19/14 at 10 pm i witnessed a remarkable event in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a singer - i got home from a show late  this evening. ...I stayed up late checking email and making chamomile tea... at 2: 34 am approximately i turned off all the lights and as i was passing a big picture window in my living room i noticed two hovering lights in the sky out over the  sound. 
 at first i thought it must be an airplane except the lights were too far apart and they seemed to stay in one place for awhile. then they were joined by two more lights that came in from the west. they looked to be larger and moving towards the first two lights. as i stood there transfixed, the cup of tea still in my hand, i watched as more lights appeared and it started to look like i was seeing aa huge triangle of lights gathering together...Or just coming on one by one? my heart was actually pounding and i nearly felt like i couldn't move   - rooted watching this huge craft -? - or armada or ships.  as i continued watching about a minute or more passed and slowly the triangle began to turn and then move all as one towards the south east and the olympic mountains. i started to think i should grab my binoculars but instead watched it move slowly  away sparkling with white and pale yellow (and some very pale rose tinged light) it eventually disappeared from sight. i don''t know why i didn't run outside b to see it more closely but i really felt like i couldn't move.

it was not so much scary as it was a moment of proof of something i have known to be true from past experiences in my childhood in ireland but at the same time when you cannot fathom what you are seeing and momentarily doubt your ability to be rational ....It is still making me feel adrenaline.
content.summary: I saw a large triangle of lights moving and turning and finally heading across the sound towards the olympic mountains

content.detailedDescription: Roommate and i were outside smoking when i looked toward the nails to the east and thought i saw a plane but it was going as fast a fighter jet.  it blinked like it was a plane but it started blinking at random intervals.  sometimes all red for a brief second.  no sound was heard and so my roommate and i bolted to our car to chase after it.  as soon as we hit the main road going east, it was already gone.  it's a quiet night and not a single sound in the air.  earlier in the day i saw about 4 pairs of what looked like f16's flying doing runs.  so the sound of the engines are fresh in my mind.  nothing.  almost as fast as a fighter.
content.summary: Fast unknown craft cruising with random blinking lights sometimes stationary lights

content.detailedDescription: From greensboro i was driving to raleigh to meet a friend. it was my first time driving this route. at one point i found myself looking way up above me whilst on a narrow road surrounded by trees on both sides of me. there were these blue lights gliding across the sky. i was unable to stop because there was another car behind me. it appeared that the lights came from a hovering craft that spun - causing the lights to look like they were blinking. it was such a spectacular blue. a glowing blue. because i could not take my eyes off the road just to completely stare at it.. from a distance when i looked up next it had disappeared curving west and into the lefthand side of the trees.
content.summary: Blue lights from a spinning ufo that glided across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Large bright orange orb seen crossing sky just above trees! 
  my boyfriend and i reside in evansville a nice little city along the ohio river in southwestern indiana. we were driving home and all of a sudden up ahead just above the tree line we both observed a very unusual bright orange light you might say it was florescent, the object was moving slowly across the sky north to south and right towards us, over whelmed we pulled over and observed the object float by us, we heard no sound and the object was very stealth and moved like a falling leaf, the center was almost to bright to look as the object pasted very close to us, again it was very bright orange, it was large and perfectly round and symmetrical, we noticed the objects path take a couple noticeable directional changes as we observed it for several minutes the object ascended to the south and disappeared in the night sky. my boy friend and his daughter claimed to have seen a similar orb about a month ago, though i was sympathetic it didn't really register until tonight. i have never seen anything like it and no doubt seeing is believing.
content.summary: My boyfriend and i observed a very bright orange object slowly moving south at low alltitude

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside sitting on my porch smoking. i was looking at the stars. i had the door closed and the light off. i noticed what i thought was a very high altitude airplane to the west. it was emitting a bright white light.  it was heading in my direction which is east of where it was located.  it abruptly made a 90 degree turn to the north.  and then blinked and shot up and was gone. it didn't last very long as it was moving very fast. 
directly under where it started there was an actual plane heading southwest toward the dfw area. i noticed this due to it not having the normal green and red lights and because it was moving extremely fast, faster than the plane was going. it emitted a steady white light. 
this isn't the first time i have seen something strange out here. 
since the weekend of the 4th i have observed a few objects showing the same behavior. 
has anyone else seen anything like this in the same area?  
i'm not sure what it was but, it moved too fast.
content.summary: Seen in the west started going east the abruptly change direction to north. made 90 degree turn
